MS MCQs

    Identify general capabilities of Microsoft Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management

    »

    1. A mixed-mode item requires discrete, lean and process manufacturing to produce. Does Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management support mixed-mode manufacturing?

      No. Dynamics 365 Supply Chain can support only one manufacturing mode at a time.

      Some. Dynamics 365 Supply Chain can support only two modes when producing a single product.

      Yes. Dynamics 365 Supply Chain can support all three modes when producing a single product.


    2. Which of the following defines how distinct products are described and how they behave in business processes?

      Product variant

      Product

      Product master


    3. Which feature should you activate so that organizations can deactivate structures that are irrelevant to the company’s business processes?

      Trade agreements

      Resource capabilities

      Production groups
